attributes.action: mandate the power consumption of electrical appliances in standby mode to be less than one watt
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Electrical appliances continue to draw anything up to around 20 watts when in 'standby' mode as there is no legislation in place to control it. This is needless waste as a matter of milliwatts is all that's needed for any device to tick over while inactive. Components that comply should carry a 'less than a watt' logo.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "mandate the power consumption of electrical appliances in standby mode to be less than one watt."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
